movies.title: Pieces of Talent
movies.plot: This story centers around Charlotte, a struggling young actress who can't catch a break. In an effort to support herself and her hopeless mother, Charlotte holds a job as a cocktail waitress at a seedy, local strip club and hates every minute of it. During a cigarette break late one evening she witnesses an altercation between an overzealous bouncer and an unfortunate passerby, David. David makes movies and given Charlotte's career interests a friendship quickly develops. Soon enough, David mentions a project he has in the works that she would be perfect for and an excited Charlotte agrees to take part. She has no idea what she has signed up for.
movies.simplePlot: This story centers around Charlotte, a struggling young actress who can't catch a break. In an effort to support herself and her hopeless mother, Charlotte holds a job as a cocktail ...

biography.bio: David Long is an actor and writer, known for Pieces of Talent (2014), A Missing Piece (2015) and The Box (2013).
biography.name: David Long

biography.bio: Kristi Ray is an American film actress, born to a large family and supportive community in New Bern, NC. Professionally trained in Method Acting in both New York City and Los Angeles, she received a full merit-based scholarship to study with Lola Cohen at The Lee Strasberg Theatre and Film Institute in Manhattan. Nominated for Best Actress in a Leading Role in 2013 for her portrayal of Charlotte in the internationally acclaimed, award winning feature film Pieces of Talent.
biography.name: Kristi Ray

biography.bio: Taylor Kowalski was born on July 5, 1988 in Van Nuys, California, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Homeland (2011), The Detour (2016) and Snowfall (2017).
biography.name: Taylor Kowalski

biography.bio: Barbara Weetman is an actress, known for The Notebook (2004), Stuck in Love (2012) and Jessabelle (2014).
biography.name: Barbara Weetman

biography.bio: Jon Stafford is an actor, known for Full Metal Jacket (1987), The Longest Ride (2015) and What to Expect When You're Expecting (2012).
biography.name: Jon Stafford

biography.bio: Nate Panning is an actor and writer, known for Stuck in Love (2012), Return of the Rednecks (2006) and Piranha 3DD (2012).
biography.name: Nate Panning

biography.bio: Joy Merrow is an actress, known for Pieces of Talent (2014), Fistful of Brains (2008) and A Few Brains More (2012).
biography.name: Joy Merrow

biography.bio: Shane Callahan is an actor and editor, known for Outsiders (2016), Nashville (2012) and The Vampire Diaries (2009).
biography.name: Shane Callahan

biography.bio: John Marchioni is known for his work on Pieces of Talent (2014), Fatal Flaw (2008) and The Waters: Phase One (2012).
biography.name: John Marchioni

biography.bio: Simon Crist is an actor, known for Pieces of Talent (2014), Jungo Goes Bananas: Jungo III (2007) and Suicide for Beginners.
biography.name: Simon Crist

biography.bio: Shaun O'Rourke was born on April 22, 1975 in Jersey City, New Jersey, USA. He is known for his work on Traded (2016), Journey 2: The Mysterious Island (2012) and We're the Millers (2013).
biography.name: Shaun O'Rourke

biography.bio: Mike Kirkpatrick was born on January 7, 1986 in Spangler, Pennsylvania, USA. He is known for his work on Hammer (2009), Pieces of Talent (2014) and Dream (2010).
biography.name: Mike Kirkpatrick

biography.bio: Johnny Blanton is an actor, known for Pieces of Talent (2014), Two-Eleven (2015) and The Gritter's (2011).
biography.name: Johnny Blanton

biography.bio: Patt Noday is known for appearing in such films as_Leatherheads(2008)_, _Home of the Giants (2005)_, Deja Vu (2006), Empire Records (1995), Domestic Disturbance (2001), Cherry Falls (2000), What the Deaf Man Heard (1997), Super Mario Bros. (1993), Sleeping with the Enemy (1991), Eddie (1996), Weekend at Bernie's (1989), Radioland Murders (1994) and more, plus, on TV Series like One Tree Hill (2003), Sleepy Hollow (2013), Surface (2007), Dawson's Creek (1998), Matlock (1986) and many other shows.
biography.name: Patt Noday

biography.bio: Donna Stamm is an actor, known for All You Can Eat (2013) and Pieces of Talent (2014).
biography.name: Donna Stamm

awards.award: New York City Horror Film Festival 2013
